charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) is one of the previous Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a particularly cruel individual.

abilities.name: Explosive Tag Scroll
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) uses Explosive Tag Scroll and gains 10 destructible defense permanently. Silent Explosion will deal 200% damage for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Silent Explosion
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) uses Silent Explosion on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. Non affliction ranged skills will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Shibuki
abilities.description: Using Shibuki Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) will gain 50% damage reduction for 1 turn. During this skill any enemy that uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) will be dealt 10 affliction damage* permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Shibuki Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
